amendment.description: Amendment sought to narrow the scope of the underlying bill to include strategic and critical minerals only.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-590 to narrow the scope of the underlying bill to include strategic and critical minerals only.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 251 (Roll no. 462).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 251 (Roll no. 462).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Tonko.
